title: Exodus The Walking Warrior
body:
(P) Legend of Confusion:Using an ability gains a stack of confusion every 10 stacks give him 5 bonus ad damage
(Q) Mechanical: Exodus will teleport infront of his target, within the next 4/5/6/7 seconds exodus can cast q again for free which will place him behind his original target  Cooldown 10/9/8/7/6 seconds Costs 50/45/40/35/30 mana
(W) Warrior: Passive gives exodus +4/8/12/17% bonus ad active gives exodus a bonus 10/14/18/22/26% AD for 3/5/7/9/11 seconds 25/23/20/18/15 seconds  costs 70/60/50/40/30 mana
(E) Hero: places down a controllable missle that will follow command by simply alt+ Clannad, an attack is self detonation dealing 5/10/15/20/25% max health  CoolDown 20/18/16/14/12 seconds the Cooldown applies after the missle has detonated , the missle lasts for 5/17/19/21/23 seconds costs 80/75/70/65/60 mana
(R) Mass Confusion: Exodus silences his oppenent giving him 20/40/60 bonus confusion then exodus will summon his SOLIDERS to strick a target dealing 200/300/400 AD damage  costs 100/100/100 mana

Stats
Health 780/15
Mana 250/5
Health Regen 2
Mana Regen 2
Armour 40
Magic resist 30
Attack speed: 0.9
Attack range: 400
